DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , parallel , single-blinded multi-center study . The objective compare long term clinical outcome among site atrial pacing compare long term effect atrial fibrillation ( AF ) Suppression algorithm .
DOC.brief_title: SAFE Study - Septal Pacing Atrial Fibrillation Suppression Evaluation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have history paroxysmal AF document AF episode within last 6 month ; documentation AF require . It document one following : Holter documentation strip must least 30 second ; OR one page 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ; OR transtelephonic record 15 second . 2 . Have conventional indication pacemaker due either sinus atrioventricular ( AV ) node disease . 3 . Provide write informed consent study participation willing able comply prescribe followup test schedule evaluation . 4 . Be least 18 year old . 1 . Already implanted pacemaker implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) . 2 . Are expected heart surgery within next 6 month . 3 . Have angina pectoris , New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class III Class IV . 4 . Are expect able tolerate high rate pacing . 5 . Have less 12 month ' life expectancy . 6 . Are cardiac transplantation list . 7 . Are chronic AF . 8 . Have reversible aetiology AF ( e.g. , hyperthyroidism , acute postcardiac surgery AF , etc . ) .
